flowchart TD A[Config Records Loaded] --> B[Determine Component Type] B --> C[Lookup Component Settings
colors, fonts, sizes, styles] C --> D[Select Matching Partial] D --> E[Merge Component Settings Into Data Array] E --> F[Render Partial With Mustache] F --> G[Assemble Final Output In Layout Template]
